shortest-path.name: Shortest path
shortest-path.query:
MATCH p=shortestPath((a:Author)-[:AUTHORS*0..6]-(b:Author)) 
 WHERE a.first = 'Swabha' 
 AND a.last = 'Swayamdipta' 
 AND b.first = 'Regina' 
 AND b.last = 'Barzilay' 
 RETURN p

experts.name: Find experts
experts.query:
MATCH (a:Author)-[:AUTHORS]->(p:Paper), 
 (p)-[:MENTIONS]->(:Entity {name: 'Relationship extraction'}) 
 WHERE p.year > 2013 
 WITH a, count(p) as cp 
 RETURN a.first, a.last, cp 
 ORDER BY cp DESC

intersecting-entities.name: Intersecting entities
intersecting-entities.query:
MATCH (p:Paper)-[:MENTIONS]->(e1:Entity {name: 'Constraint programming'}), 
 (p:Paper)-[:MENTIONS]->(e2:Entity {name: 'Natural language processing'}) 
 RETURN p.title

canonical-entity.name: Canonical entity
canonical-entity.query:
MATCH (e:Entity) 
 WHERE e.name =~ '(?i)relationship extraction' 
 RETURN e.name

scientific-concepts.name: Scientific concepts
scientific-concepts.query:
MATCH path=shortestPath((er:Entity {name: 'Estrogen Receptors'})-[:WITH_ENTITY*0..15]-(ar:Entity {name: 'Arimidex'})) 
 WITH nodes(path) as ns UNWIND ns as n 
 MATCH (n)-[:WITH_ENTITY]->(e0:Entity), 
 (n)-[:WITH_ENTITY]->(e1:Entity), 
 (n)-[:WITH_RELATIONSHIP]->(r:Relation) 
 RETURN e0.name, r.relation_type, e1.name

citation-metrics.name: Citation metrics
citation-metrics.query:
MATCH (p1:Paper)-[:APPEARS_IN]->(naacl:Venue), 
 (p2:Paper)-[:APPEARS_IN]->(cvpr:Venue), 
 path=((p1)-[:CITES]->(p2)) 
 WHERE naacl.text =~ '.*NAACL.*' 
 AND cvpr.text =~ '.*CVPR.*' 
 RETURN count(distinct path)
